title: Blistered Broccolini with Cranberries and Capers Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup fresh', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'broccolini'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}]
directions: ['Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source; preheat broiler.', 'Microwave dried cranberries and orange juice In a small bowl on High until cranberries are plump, about 25 seconds. Drain, reserving the juice.', 'On a foil-lined 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet, toss together cranberries, broccolini, red onion, oil, capers, pepper, and salt; spread in an even layer.', 'Broil, stirring halfway through, until broccolini is blistered, about 10 minutes. Toss with orange zest and the reserved juice before serving.']

title: Holiday Monkey Bread Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rise Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg,'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried cranberries'}]
directions: ['For dough, warm milk in a saucepan over low heat, or in the microwave, to no higher than 105 degrees F (40 degrees C). Pour warm milk into the bowl of a stand mixer, sprinkle in yeast; let stand 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Combine sugar, egg, melted butter, flour, and salt, and knead in the bowl of a stand mixer. Knead with the dough hook attachment on low speed until a soft, smooth, elastic dough forms, about 10 minutes. Add walnuts and cranberries, and knead until evenly distributed, 1 to 2 minutes more.', 'Cover bowl and let dough rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 1/2 hours. Meanwhile, for cinnamon sugar, stir sugar and cinnamon together in a shallow bowl; set aside.', 'Butter a Bundt pan generously; set aside. Butter a work surface, and set dough on top. Press and stretch dough into a 15x15-inch square; brush generously with melted butter.', 'Using a pizza cutter, cut dough into 64 squares. Roll each piece into a ball, and then roll in cinnamon sugar. Transfer dough balls into the greased Bundt pan, without pressing them together.', 'Cover and let proof for about 35 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Meanwhile, for sugar syrup, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in brown sugar, and wait for the mixture to just start to bubble slightly, stirring occasionally. Turn off heat and whisk in orange zest. Continue to whisk until a smooth caramel-like sauce forms. Pour sauce over top of dough balls, coating evenly.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until a skewer inserted near the center comes out clean, about 35 minutes. To be safe, place a sheet pan on the rack below the Bundt pan in the oven to catch any dripping syrup. Let monkey bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes;\xa0turn out onto a plate. Let cool to just warm before serving.']

title: Creamy Jalapeno Cranberry Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Soak Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10 to 12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapeno pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pickled jalapenos'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) packages', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'asiago cheese'}]
directions: ['Place cranberries in a small bowl and cover with boiling water. Let stand for 3 minutes to soften slightly and drain.', 'Add cranberries, jalapeno, pickled jalapeno, brine, red onion, and sugar into a food processor and pulse until very finely chopped.', 'Combine cranberry mixture with softened cream cheese and asiago cheese and stir until well blended. Refrigerate until ready to serve.']

title: Cranberry Cheese Ball Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cranberry juice cocktail'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried cranberries, snipped, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8-ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chives, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pecans, toasted and finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'crackers, crostini, and/or vegetable dippers for serving'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Bring cranberry juice just to a boil in a small saucepan. Remove from heat. Add 1/4 cup dried cranberries. Cover; set aside.', 'Place cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, and butter in a large bowl. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes.', 'Drain cranberries, reserving 1 tablespoon juice. Add plumped cranberries and reserved juice to the bowl with the cheese mixture. Add 1 tablespoon chives, orange zest, brown sugar, and garlic powder. Beat with an electric mixer on medium until light and fluffy.', 'Place cheese mixture on a sheet of plastic wrap. Use the plastic wrap to shape the mixture into a ball (it wonâ€™t be a perfect shape at this point). Wrap in the plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator for 3 to 24 hours.', 'Now you can make a better ball shape by rolling the wrapped mixture on your work surface.', 'Sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup dried cranberries, remaining 1 tablespoon chives, and the pecans on a sheet of plastic wrap or waxed paper. Roll cheese ball in the mixture to coat.', 'Let stand 15 minutes before serving with crackers, crostini, or vegetable dippers.']

title: Pecan Pie Cheese Ball Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '3 1/2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'packages', 'Name': 'caramel dip singles'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'toasted pecans'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) packages', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'powdered sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'package', 'Name': 'instant vanilla pudding mix'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '2/3 cup', 'Name': 'pecans, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'apple slices'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Stir together caramel dip and 1 tablespoon of the pecans in a small bowl; store in refrigerator until ready to use.', 'Beat cream cheese and butter with a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary. Add powdered sugar and brown sugar; beat on low until just combined, about 5 seconds; increase speed to medium-high and beat until smooth, about 30 seconds, scraping down sides of bowl as necessary. Add pudding mix, lemon juice, salt, cinnamon, and 1/3 cup of the pecans; mix until just combined, about 10 seconds.', 'Line the inside of a medium bowl with plastic wrap, leaving about a 2-inch overhang around the bowl. Place cream cheese mixture into prepared bowl, pressing down until cream cheese mixture is firmly packed; make a well in the center, about 3 inches wide and 2 inches deep. Refrigerate, uncovered, until just firm, about 45 minutes.', 'Spoon caramel mixture into the well of the chilled cream cheese mixture. Use the edges of the plastic wrap to help spread cheese evenly over caramel mixture to enclose, pressing together the edges to create a sealed ball with a caramel center. Unwrap and smooth outside of cheese with clean fingers or the back of a spoon until smooth and no cracks remain.', 'Place ball onto a new piece of plastic wrap and wrap it well, reforming it into a ball shape, about 5 inches in diameter. Place in a medium bowl and refrigerate until completely firm, 2 hours or up to 12 hours.', 'Place remaining 1/3 cup pecans on a small plate. Unwrap cheese ball and roll in pecans to fully coat. Transfer to a serving platter and drizzle with additional caramel dip.', 'Serve with apple slices, graham crackers, pretzel chips, and other dippers of choice.']

title: Pigs in a Blanket Wreath Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10 to 12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'refrigerated crescent roll dough'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12 ounce) package', 'Name': "mini sausages, such as Lil'\xa0SmokiesÂ®"}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'everything bagel seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ground mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rosemary sprigs for garnish (optional)'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.', 'Unroll and separate crescent dough into 16 triangles.\xa0 Spread each triangle evenly with Dijon mustard. Use a pizza cutter or knife to make 2 cuts into each triangle to make 3 smaller triangles.', 'Place 1 piece of cheese and 1 sausage at the bottom of each smaller triangle and roll all the way up. Place about 20 wrapped sausages on the baking sheet in a large circular shape with the sausages radiating from the center, and sides of each roll touching each other. Arrange remaining rolled sausages inside the larger ring, slightly overlapping, to form a double layer ring.', 'Brush rolls lightly with egg and sprinkle evenly with bagel seasoning.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 22 to 24 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for dipping sauce, combine mayonnaise, honey, stone ground mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and and whisk until well incorporated. Pour sauce into a bowl small enough to fit into the center of the crescent ring.', 'Transfer ring to a serving platter and place sauce bowl inside the ring. Garnish with rosemary stems to resemble a holiday wreath. Serve warm or room temperature.']

title: Crispy Brie and Cranberry Rice Paper Bites
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '15'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '7', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Brie'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cranberry sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh rosemary'}, {'Quantity': '15', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rice paper wrappers (or more as needed)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Cut the Brie into 15 equal-sized pieces, about 1/2 inch thick.', 'Take a wide, shallow bowl or a deep-rimmed plate and fill with warm water. Take one rice paper wrapper and dip it into the water, submerging it for a few seconds until slightly softened. It should still feel a bit rigid - this is key as itâ€™ll make the wrapper easier to handle.', 'Lay the soaked rice paper onto a cutting board. Place about 1 teaspoon cranberry sauce in the center, top with a slice of Brie, and a sprinkle of chopped rosemary.', 'Fold the bottom half of the rice paper up and over the Brie.', 'Fold one side over top and one side underneath.', 'Finally, fold the top underneath.', 'Repeat the soaking and wrapping process with the rest of your ingredients. Place parcels on a lightly greased baking sheet.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Once hot, add a few rice paper parcels. Do not crowd the pan or they will stick to each other. Leave them to fry until the underside looks bubbly and lightly golden in places. Flip all the parcels over and let them cook on the other side.', 'Remove parcels to a baking sheet. Continue frying remaining parcels, adding more oil as needed. Serve warm.']

title: Deviled Potato Bites Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '24'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '24 potato bites'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Tabasco'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'flaky salt'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'frozen hash brown patties'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chives'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Take a cake pan thatâ€™ll fit into a large pot or a wide, deep skillet. Line the cake pan with a piece of baking paper (cut a square of baking paper thatâ€™s a little larger than the cake pan, scrunch it up, unscrunch it and press into the pan). Carefully separate the eggs to make sure the yolks donâ€™t break. Set yolks into the cake pan (save whites for another use).', 'Place a steaming rack into the bottom of a large pot or wide skillet and add a few inches of water. Set cake pan on top of the steaming rack. Bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, cover, and steam until yolks are cooked through, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Tip cooked yolks into a bowl and allow to cool. Add mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt; mash with a fork to break up the yolks.', 'Use a stick blender to blitz the mixture until smooth and season with Tabasco to taste. If mixture is too thick, add Â½ to 1 tablespoon water and blitz again until desired consistency is reached.', 'Chill yolk mixture in the fridge until needed.', "Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). While oven preheats, place hash brown patties onto a baking sheet and soften in the oven for 5 to 10 minutes. Don't allow patties to get crispyâ€”you\xa0 only want them to soften.", 'Remove hash brown patties from the oven and, once cool enough to handle, break into thirds. Press each third into the well of a mini muffin pan.', 'Push your thumb into the hash brown cups to give them each a little dip.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden and crispy, 25 to 30 minutes.', 'Transfer hash brown bottoms to a wire rack to cool slightly before piping (or spooning) on chilled egg yolk mixture.', 'Garnish with chives, smoked paprika, and a little pinch of flaky salt then serve.']

title: Million Dollar Holiday Party Sliders Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 sliders'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sweet potato fries'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'soft rolls'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'whole grain mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'turkey meat'}, {'Quantity': '7', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Brie cheese, cut into 1/2-inch slices'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cranberry sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Spread out sweet potato fries in a 9x13-inch dish. Bake in the preheated oven according to package directions until crisp, 10 to 12 minutes. Tip sweet potato fries out onto a plate and set aside.', 'Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Keeping the rolls together, slice them in half horizontally with a bread knife. Place base of the rolls into the same 9x13-inch dish you were using earlier. Mix mustard and mayonnaise together in a small bowl and spread mizture over the cut surface.', 'Spread shredded (or sliced) turkey on top of the mayonnaise, then top with crispy sweet potato fries. Lay Brie slices evenly on top. Dot all over with spoonfuls of cranberry sauce.', 'Place the tops of the rolls back on. Pour melted butter on top and evenly brush all over using a pastry brush.', 'Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.', 'Bake sliders in the preheated oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until Brie is melty and Parmesan is golden, 20 to 25 minutes.']

title: Cranberry Jalapeno Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cranberries'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped, green parts separated from whites'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'jalapeno, seeded and membrane removed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'honey or agave nectar, plus more for drizzling'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(8-ounce) packages', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'flaky sea salt, such as'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'crackers or pita chips for serving'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place cranberries, green onion whites, jalapeÃ±o, lime juice, cilantro, honey and salt in a food processor; pulse until just finely chopped and combined.', 'Place in a fine mesh strainer over a bowl and set aside.', 'Meanwhile in a medium bowl combine cream cheese, sour cream, and heavy cream. Beat with an electric mixer until fluffy and combined.', 'Spread cream cheese mixture on a serving platter and top with strained cranberry mixture. Sprinkle flaky salt on top and garnish with green onion greens. If desired drizzle with additional honey. Serve with crackers or pita chips.']

title: Pomegranate Fizz Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'agave syrup or honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'fluid ounce', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'fluid ounces', 'Name': 'pomegranate juice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'fluid ounces', 'Name': 'club soda'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ice cubes,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime wedge'}]
directions: ['In a shaker, add basil leaves with lime juice and agave syrup and mash with a cocktail muddler. Add pomegranate juice to the shaker and shake well.', 'Fill a glass with ice cubes and strain shaker contents into the glass. Top with club soda and garnish with lime wedge.']

title: Apple Cheddar Twists Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Freeze Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 twists'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'apples'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) package', 'Name': 'puff pastry'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Cheddar cheese, grated'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'sea salt'}]
directions: ['Grate apples into a bowl and toss with lemon juice.', 'Add butter and brown sugar to a pan over medium-high heat. As butter melts, give the mixture a stir and add the apple.', 'Cook, stirring, until apples are as browned as you like and most of the liquid is evaporated, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a plate, and let cool, then refrigerate until very cold, about 20 minutes.', 'Separate puff pastry, without thawing, along the seams to get 4 equally sized rectangles. Top 2 rectangles with chilled apple mixture, and spread evenly to the edges.', 'Top each rectangle evenly with about 2 ounces grated Cheddar, saving about 2 ounces for the tops. Align remaining 2 rectangles on top and flatten with your hand. Freeze for 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment.', 'Cut each rectangle into 6 pieces. As soon as they are flexible enough to work with, start in the center, twist each strip a few times, and place on the prepared baking sheet. Top with remaining grated cheese, and sprinkle lightly with salt.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and puffy, 25 to 30 minutes.']

title: Prime Rib - It's Easier Than You Think Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(5 pound)', 'Name': 'bone-in beef prime rib roast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Montreal-style steak seasoning (such as McCormick)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chopped garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'mustard powder'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place roast, bone side down, in a roasting pan.', 'Whisk olive oil, steak seasoning, garlic, Italian seasoning, and mustard powder together in a small bowl.', 'Spread over roast. Allow roast to come to room temperature, about 45 minutes. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Insert a meat thermometer in the thickest part of the roast away from the bone. Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).', 'Continue cooking to your desired degree of doneness, or an internal temperature of 145 degrees F (65 degrees C) for medium is reached, about 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Remove from the oven, cover with a doubled sheet of aluminum foil, and allow to rest in a warm area 10 to 15 minutes before slicing.']

title: Vegetables Wellington Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '(6 to 8 ounce)', 'Name': 'sweet potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'low-sodium vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'wild rice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'button mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry sherry'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh tarragon'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'goat cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(17.3 ounce) package', 'Name': 'puff pastry'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12 ounce) jar', 'Name': 'mushroom gravy'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Drizzle sweet potatoes with 1 tablespoon melted butter and sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Wrap each potato in foil and put on a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until tender, about 1 hour.', 'Let sweet potatoes cool completely, about 1 hour. (Baked sweet potatoes can be chilled up to 5 days. Let chilled potatoes stand at room temperature 30 minutes before assembling in Step 5.)', 'Meanwhile, add 1 1/2 cups broth, rice, garlic, and 1/4 teaspoon salt to a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium high heat. Reduce heat to low. Simmer, covered, until rice is tender, 40 to 45 minutes; drain any excess water.', 'Meanwhile, melt 1/4 cup butter in a very large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid has evaporated, mushrooms are starting to brown, and onion is tender, 10 to 12 minutes. Add sherry; cook until evaporated, about 2 minutes. Stir in tarragon and remaining 1/2 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Stir in rice mixture and goat cheese until combined. Spread in an even layer on baking sheet and let cool completely. (If filling is hot, pastry will tear and not bake properly.)', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Cut each puff pastry sheet into quarters to make 8 pieces. Roll 6 pieces to 6 1/2 inch squares on a lightly floured surface. Evenly pile filling onto center of each square (about 1/3 cup per square). Top each with a sweet potato.', 'Line a clean baking sheet with foil. Beat together egg and water in a small bowl. Brush edges of topped pastry squares with egg wash. Bring up corners of pastry and gently stretch over potatoes; pinch edges to seal. Arrange bundles, seam sides down, on prepared baking sheet. Cut decorative shapes from remaining 2 pastry pieces. Arrange pastry shapes on bundles and brush with remaining egg wash to adhere.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and heated through, 20 to 25 minutes. (An instant read thermometer inserted into centers is the easiest way to test doneness. Thermometer should register at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Let stand 10 minutes. Serve with mushroom gravy.']

title: Orange Cinnamon Rolls Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 cinnamon rolls'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': 'Â¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'warm whole milk (110 degrees F (43 degrees C))'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(.25 ounce) package', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg, room temperature'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg yolk, room temperature'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, softened'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1 Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'freshly grated orange zest'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freshly squeezed orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '3 Â½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, divided, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1 Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}]
directions: ['Pour warmed milk into the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment for the dough. Sprinkle yeast evenly over the surface of the milk. Let stand until foamy, 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Add egg and egg yolk, butter, honey, orange zest, and orange juice to the yeast mixture. Beat on low until combined, about 45 seconds. Add 2 cups flour; beat on low until a wet dough forms, about 1 minute. Turn off mixer; switch to the dough hook attachment. Add 1 Â½ cups flour and salt, beat on medium until dough is soft and elastic, 7 to 10 minutes. If necessary, add an additional Â½ cup flour, tablespoon by tablespoon, using as little as possible to achieve a soft dough. The dough should be quite sticky.', 'Gather dough into a ball and transfer to a large greased bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and set aside to rise at room temperature until doubled in size, about 1 hour.', 'To make the filling: Combine butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, and orange zest in a bowl. Mix with a spatula until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute. Set aside.', 'Grease a 13x9-inch baking dish; set aside. Punch down the dough and transfer to a well-floured surface. Roll dough into a large 10x18-inch rectangle. Spread the filling over the surface of the dough, leaving a Â½ inch border along the top long edge.', 'Roll the dough away from you to create a log, and pinch seam to seal.', 'Cut dough log into 12 equal rolls (about 1 Â½ inches wide). Transfer rolls to prepared baking dish. Loosely cover with plastic wrap, and set aside to rise at room temperature until puffy and almost doubled in size, 30 to 45 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Bake rolls in the preheated oven until golden brown, 22 to 25 minutes.', 'While rolls are baking, prepare the frosting. Combine cream cheese, powdered sugar, orange zest, orange zest, and salt in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. Beat at medium-high speed until very smooth and creamy, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Remove rolls from oven and transfer to a wire rack. Let cool 2 minutes, then spread frosting evenly over the rolls. Serve warm.']

title: Homemade Vegan Cheese with Cranberries Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '6 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '6 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped raw cashews'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'water to cover'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'nutritional yeast (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'miso paste'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'finely chopped walnuts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'finely chopped hazelnuts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'finely chopped dried cranberries'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'finely chopped fresh rosemary'}]
directions: ['Cover cashews with cold water in a bowl and soak for 4 hours. Drain.', 'Combine cashews, nutritional yeast, vinegar, miso paste, and salt in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended. Taste and adjust seasonings according to your taste.', 'Grease a piece of parchment paper with oil. Transfer cashew mixture onto parchment paper and form into a roll, twisting the ends of the paper to secure. Refrigerate until firm, at least 2 hours.', 'Mix walnuts, hazelnuts, cranberries, and rosemary on a plate. Remove cheese log from fridge and paper and roll in the nut mixture.']

title: Pomegranate Mimosa Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'fluid ounces', 'Name': 'pomegranate juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'fluid ounce', 'Name': 'orange flavored liqueur'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'luid ounces', 'Name': 'Champagne'}]
directions: ['In a champagne flute, combine pomegranate juice and orange liqueur. Top with champagne and serve.']

title: Peppermint Mocha Cookie Bars Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white chocolate chips'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'peppermint extract'}]
directions: ['Place white chocolate chips, heavy cream, and 1/8 teaspoon peppermint extract into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave at 50% power in 30 second intervals, stirring after each interval, until melted and combined. Place mixture, uncovered, in the refrigerator until completely chilled, about 1 hour.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line an 8x8-inch square pan with enough parchment paper to have overhang on all sides.', 'In a small bowl or measuring cup, stir espresso powder and hot water together until dissolved.', 'In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, salt, baking soda, and baking powder until thoroughly combined.', 'Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Add in egg and beat until thoroughly combined. Add in espresso mixture, vanilla extract, and 1/2 teaspoon peppermint extract and mix until combined. Pour in half of the flour mixture and mix until just combined. Add in remaining flour mixture and mix until just combinedâ€”dough will be somewhat thick. Stir in chocolate chips and crushed candy canes. Spread dough into the prepared pan in an even layer.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the bars look just set, 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool completely in the pan, about 30 minutes.', 'Remove chilled white chocolate mixture from the fridge. Whip on medium-high speed with an electric mixer until mixture holds stiff peaks. Spread white chocolate frosting in a thin even layer over the top of the cooled bars and sprinkle with additional crushed candy canes. Cut into 16 bars.']

title: Instant Gingerbread Hot Chocolate Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '20'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cocoa'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'easpoon', 'Name': 'cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper (optional)'}]
directions: ['Add cocoa, white sugar, brown sugar, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, salt, and cayenne to a bowl, and whisk thoroughly to combine.', 'Store in an airtight container until needed. Be sure to stir very thoroughly before each use.', 'To make hot chocolate, heat milk over medium heat until it almost starts to simmer. Whisk in 2 tablespoons of instant gingerbread hot chocolate mix per 1 cup milk.', 'Once everything is mixed together and dissolved, and the milk is piping hot, transfer into mugs and enjoy.']

title: Nutella Twists Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '12 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '27 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 (17. 3 ounce) box', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'puff pastry'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Nutella'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.', 'Lightly flour a work surface, and roll 1 puff pastry sheet out into a 10x10-inch square; set aside. Repeat with the second pastry sheet.', 'Spread chocolate hazelnut spread evenly across 1 puff pastry sheet. Carefully lay the second puff pastry sheet directly over top. Trim any uneven edges. Cut the pastry into 10 long 1-inch wide strips using a sharp knife or pizza cutter.', 'Working with 1 strip at a time, twist each strip of pastry until the strip is twisted along the entire length. Starting at one end, coil strip into a round, tucking the end underneath. Gently set onto the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining strips.', 'Beat egg in a small bowl with a fork. Brush tops of twists with egg wash using a pastry brush.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 12 to 14 minutes. Let cool on a wire rack.']

title: Puppy Chow Truffles Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Freeze Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '30'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cereal'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': "confectioner's sugar"}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'peanut butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'semisweet chocolate chips'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'coconut oil'}]
directions: ['Add the Chex cereal to a large plastic bag and, using a rolling pin, crush into fine pieces.', 'Stir the 3 cups crushed Chex, 1/2 cup confectionerâ€™s sugar, and peanut butter together in a large bowl until evenly combined. Freeze mixture until firm to the touch, about 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, in a microwave-safe bowl, melt semisweet chocolate in 10 second intervals until smooth, stirring in between. Add coconut oil and stir until combined.', 'Line a baking sheet with parchment. Using a 2 teaspoon cookie scoop, portion the peanut butter mixture into 1-inch balls. Roll the rounds between your hands to shape, and arrange on the prepared baking sheet.', 'Using a wooden pick or fork, dip truffles into the melted chocolate. Transfer back to the parchment-lined baking sheet. Let truffles cool in the refrigerator until set, about 20 minutes.', 'To serve, dust truffles in the remaining 1/4 cup confectionerâ€™s sugar.']

title: Cannoli Cream Pie Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 9-inch pie'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '9-inch)', 'Name': 'graham cracker crust'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1 (8', 'Unit': 'ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese, at room temperature'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': "confectioner's sugar"}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'full fat ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'salted pistachios'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mini chocolate chips, plus more for topping'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients, and preheat the oven to 325 degrees F(165 degrees C).', 'Bake graham cracker crust in the preheated oven until golden brown and fragrant, about 10 minutes. Let cool completely on a wire rack.', 'Add heavy whipping cream to a clean bowl, and beat with an electric mixer to stiff peaks. Set aside.', 'Beat cream cheese and powdered sugar together in another bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in ricotta, vanilla extract, and salt until thoroughly combined.', 'Gently fold whipped cream into ricotta mixture. Gently fold in chopped pistachios and mini chocolate chips.', 'Pour the filing into the prepared pie crust and spread evenly. Chill in the refrigerator for 5 hours or up to overnight. Top with mini chocolate chips to serve.']

title: Crispy Smashed Potatoes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6 to 8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'red skinned potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'armesan cheese, finely shredded (about 3/4 cup)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'italian parsley'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place potatoes in a large saucepan, and add enough water to cover by at least 1 inch. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer\xa0until potatoes are very tender, about 20 minutes; drain.', 'Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).\xa0 Line a 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil. Brush foil with 1 tablespoon olive oil.', 'Transfer potatoes to the prepared baking pan. Use a wide-bottomed glass to lightly press down on each potato to smash to about 1/2-inch thickness, while keeping each potato in one piece.', 'Brush smashed potatoes with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.', 'Roast in the preheated oven, uncovered, until bottoms are lightly browned and crisp, about 15 minutes.', 'Turn potatoes; sprinkle with the remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Return to the oven and roast until potatoes are lightly browned and crisp, 10 to 15 minutes more.', 'Preheat the broiler and set a rack 4 to 5 inches from the heat source. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over potatoes.', 'Broil until cheese is golden brown and crispy, about 3 minutes. Garnish with parsley.']

title: Creamy Bacon Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6 (serving size: about 1 1/2 cups)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'thick-cut bacon, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'spaghetti'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh flat-leaf parsley'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Scatter bacon evenly over the bottom of a 13-x-9-inch baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven, stirring twice during cooking, until bacon is crispy and fat has rendered, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from the oven and transfer bacon to a small paper-towel-lined plate and set aside. Reduce oven temperature to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Remove all but 2 tablespoons of the bacon fat from the baking dish. Add onion, tomato paste, and crushed red pepper to reserved hot bacon fat in the baking dish and stir until onion is well coated in tomato paste.', 'Add chicken broth, cream, wine, salt, 3/4 cup of the Parmigiano-Reggiano, and stir to combine. Spread spaghetti into broth mixture and bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C), uncovered, stirring every 8 to 10 minutes, until spaghetti is tender, has absorbed most of the sauce, and the sauce has thickened, 40 to 45 minutes.', 'Remove and top with 1/4 cup of the reserved bacon, remaining 1/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano and parsley.', 'Serve immediately, garnishing each serving with more reserved bacon, as desired.']

title: Tex-Mex Ground Beef and Potato Skillet Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'hash brown potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'corn kernels'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'zucchini'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10 ounce) can', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes and green chilies, (such as Ro-TelÂ® Original)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'taco seasoning, mild or hot'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, sliced'}]
directions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir ground beef, breaking up the pieces as it cooks, until browned and crumbly. 3 to 5 minutes. Drain off excess fat.', 'Add potatoes, corn, zucchini, beef broth, RO-TEL, taco seasoning, and cumin. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer until vegetables are tender, 20 to 25 minutes. Taste and adjust seasonings.', 'Stir in Cheddar, and allow to melt. Remove from heat. Garnish with dollops of sour cream and sliced green onions, and serve immediately.']

title: Bobotie (South African Beef Casserole) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Soak Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay laurel leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chutney,'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'white bread'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Heat olive oil and butter in a large oven-proof skillet over medium heat. Add onions and salt, and cook until just beginning to soften and turn translucent, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Stir in curry powder, cumin, turmeric, black pepper, and oregano, and cook for 1 to 2 minutes more.', 'Add ground beef, and cook, stirring, while breaking the meat up into small crumbles. Add 1 bay leaf, tomato paste, and garlic, and cook, stirring, for another 2 minutes.', 'Stir in lemon juice and zest, vinegar, Worcestershire, and chutney. Smooth the top, and simmer mixture gently for 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add bread to a bowl and cover with 1/2 cup of milk, toss, and let stand for 5 minutes. Squeeze excess milk back into the bowl and add soaked bread to meat. Mash, smash and stir mixture until bread is thoroughly blended in.', 'Add remaining 1 cup milk to the bowl; add eggs, cayenne, and pinch of salt, and whisk thoroughly. Pour gently over meat, and top with 3 or more bay leaves.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until custard on top is set and lightly golden brown, about 45 minutes. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.']

title: Alfredo Gnocchi Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shaved Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '18', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'gnocchi'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'black pepper'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Spray an 8x8-inch baking pan with nonstick spray.', 'Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook and stir until fragrant, about 40 seconds. Stir in evaporated milk and cream. Add Parmesan and stir until smooth.', 'Add gnocchi;\xa0\xa0toss to coat. Pour gnocchi into the prepared pan. Sprinkle with black pepper.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 25 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Phyllisâ€™s Homemade Baked Mac & Cheese Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '24', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'extra-sharp yellow Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'elbow macaroni'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'seasoned breadcrumbs'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a large casserole dish.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add milk, bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low. Mix flour with 2 to 3 tablespoons water until smooth.\xa0 Add flour mixture to the saucepan, stirring constantly, and cook until sauce thickens. Add cubed extra-sharp Cheddar and cubed sharp Cheddar cheese, stirring until cheese melts. Remove from heat.', 'Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, and cook elbow macaroni until al dente (tender with a bite), about 8 minutes, or according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.', 'Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in a microwave-safe bowl on High, about 10 seconds. In a large bowl, combine elbow macaroni, melted\xa0 butter, and eggs. Stir in cheese sauce; adding a little more milk if the sauce seems too thick. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Pour macaroni and cheese into the prepared casserole dish. Top with shredded cheese and seasoned breadcrumbs.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden-brown and bubbling, 35 to 45 minutes.']

title: Creamy Cowboy Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'flour'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10 ounce) can', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes with green chilies'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '15 ounce) can', 'Name': 'ranch style beans'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'Name': 'corn'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 8 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels; chop when cool enough to handle.', 'Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; whisk in flour. Slowly add evaporated milk, whisking until smooth. Cook until thickened slightly, about 2 minutes; remove from heat.', 'Add oil to a large pot or Dutch oven; cook onions over medium heat until nearly translucent. Add ground beef, and cook and stir, breaking up chunks with a spatula as it cooks, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain any excess fat.', 'Add bacon, diced tomatoes with green chiles, beans, and corn. Pour in beef broth and add the diced potatoes. Stir to combine. Add garlic granules, and cumin. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Bring soup to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Cover; simmer until potatoes are tender;\xa0 20 to 30 minutes. Pour evaporated milk mixture into soup; stir to combine. Serve immediately.']

title: Copycat Trader Joeâ€™s Butternut Squash Mac and Cheese Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6 (serving size: about 1 1/2 cups)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'rigatoni pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'butternut squash'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sage leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup shredded', 'Name': 'Gouda cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high. Add pasta and cook according to package directions for al dente. Drain, reserving 1 cup of pasta cooking water; set pasta aside.', 'While pasta cooks, melt butter in a large Dutch oven over medium. Add butternut squash, sage, thyme, salt, and pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned on all sides, about 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Stir in milk, onion powder, garlic powder, cayenne, nutmeg, and turmeric and bring to a boil over high, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until squash is tender, about 6 minutes.', 'Transfer squash mixture into a blender and add Dijon mustard. Secure lid on blender, and remove center piece to allow steam to escape. Place a clean towel over opening. Process until very smooth, about 30 seconds. (Alternatively, puree soup with an immersion blender until smooth, about 3 minutes).', 'Add pasta and pureed squash mixture to Dutch oven; gently heat over medium until pasta is warmed through, about 2 minutes. Stir in Cheddar, Gouda and Parmesan and cook over low, stirring constantly, until smooth, about 1 minute. Stir in 1/4 cup of the reserved pasta cooking water. Cook, stirring often, and add remaining cooking water, 1/4 cup at a time, as needed, until sauce is creamy and clings to pasta, 2 to 3 minutes. Season with additional salt to taste.', 'Divide among bowls and garnish with thyme, black pepper, and Parmesan.']

title: Slow Cooker Cheeseburger Soup Recipe

title: Slow Cooker Buffalo White Chicken Chili Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'buffalo wing sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce can)', 'Name': 'fire roasted diced tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(4 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'green chiles'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 ounce) packet', 'Name': 'ranch seasoning mix'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(15.5 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'white beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sour cream'}]
directions: ['Add chicken breasts, chicken thighs, onion, wing sauce, tomatoes, green chiles, ranch seasoning, chili powder, paprika, cumin, and chicken broth to a slow cooker. Cook on High for 2 hours or Low for 3 to 4 hours.', 'Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred into bite-sized pieces. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir in beans and cream cheese. Cover and cook until cream cheese is melted, about 15 minutes. Add additional stock if desired for a thinner chili.', 'Serve topped with sour cream, shredded Cheddar cheese, and green onions. Drizzle with more hot sauce to taste.']

title: Apple Sausage Gravy Dumplings Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'pork sausage'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'yellow onion,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'apple'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green onions'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}]
directions: ['Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and add sausage. Cook and stir, breaking up chunks with a spatula, until browned and crumbly, about 5 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to medium, add onions and a pinch of salt, and cook, stirring, until onions start to turn soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir in butter, and once melted, add flour. Cook, stirring, for about 2 minutes. Add diced apple, and cook, stirring for another minute or so.', 'Pour in chicken broth, raise heat to high, and stir with a spoon, scraping up all the browned bits (fond) from the bottom. Add milk and bring mixture to a simmer. Reduce heat to between medium and medium-low, and simmer for about 15 minutes. For thicker gravy, mixture can be reduced further. Reduce heat to medium-low and prepare dumpling batter.', 'Combine egg, cider, creme fraiche, thyme, 2 tablespoons green onions, 1 teaspoon salt, and baking powder in a bowl and whisk thoroughly. Add 1 cup flour and whisk just until flour disappears. Clean off whisk with a spatula, and scrape down the sides of the bowl, mixing in any visible flour. Set batter aside until needed.', 'Stir gravy and taste for seasoningâ€”add more salt if needed, plus freshly ground black pepper, cayenne, 1/4 cup green onions, and 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar.', 'Raise heat to medium, and transfer generous, rounded teaspoons of dumpling batter on top of the simmering gravy.', 'Cover, and let cook, untouched, until dumplings are puffed up, and floating on top, 5 to 6 minutes. A skewer inserted into the center of a dumpling should come out clean. Serve immediately topped with additional green onions if desired.']

title: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken Chili Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(15-ounce) cans', 'Name': 'cans'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(14.5-ounce)', 'Name': 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes with garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup B', 'Name': 'B'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'plain whole-milk strained (Greek-style) yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ranch dressing mix'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cream cheese, cubed and softened'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'scallions'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tortilla chips for serving (optional)'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'In a 6-quart slow cooker, stir together beans, diced tomatoes with garlic, onion, bell pepper, hot sauce, chili powder, and garlic powder; nestle chicken in bean mixture.', 'Cover and cook until chicken is tender, about 3 hours on HIGH and 5 hours on LOW.', 'Meanwhile, stir together yogurt and ranch dressing mix in a small bowl until smooth. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.', 'Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred it using two forks.', 'Return shredded chicken to slow cooker. Stir in cream cheese until smooth and well combined. Cover and cook on HIGH until warmed through, about 30 minutes.', 'Serve with a dollop of yogurt mixture. Garnish with scallions and serve with tortilla chips, if desired.']

title: Marry Me Chicken Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces uncooked', 'Name': 'penne pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon freshly ground', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons I', 'Name': 'talian seasoning, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'drained jarred julienne-cut sun-dried tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oil from sun-dried tomato jar'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'garlic cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(5 ounces)', 'Name': 'baby spinach'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups shredded', 'Name': 'part-skim mozzarella cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'armesan cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko (Japanese-style breadcrumbs)'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes. Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water. Drain pasta and transfer to an ungreased 13- x 9-inch baking dish.', 'Season chicken breasts evenly with black pepper and 1 teaspoon each of the Italian seasoning and salt. Heat 2 tablespoons of sun-dried tomato oil in a large skillet over medium until shimmering. Add chicken breasts and cook until golden brown and a thermometer inserted into the thickest part registers 165 degrees F (73 degrees C), 10 to 15 minutes, flipping occasionally. Transfer to a cutting board and let rest 5 minutes. Thinly slice chicken and add to pasta in baking dish. Do not clean skillet.', 'Add 1 tablespoon of the sun-dried tomato oil to skillet and return to medium heat. Add onion and garlic, and cook, stirring often, until softened, about 6 minutes. Add white wine, tomato paste, and 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, and cook, stirring often, until liquid is reduced by half, about 2 minutes.\xa0Stir in butter until melted. Sprinkle flour over sun-dried tomato mixture and cook, stirring constantly, until thick and pasty, about 1 minute. Gradually stir in reserved pasta cooking water and milk.', 'Cook, stirring often, until thickened and smooth, about 2 minutes.', 'Add spinach, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons salt. Cook over medium, stirring constantly, until wilted and bright green, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup of the Paremsan cheese until melted. Transfer to pasta mixture in baking dish and stir until well combined. Set aside.', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato oil in a small skillet over medium-high. Add panko and remaining 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and cook, stirring constantly, until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Sprinkle pasta mixture with remaining 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and toasted panko mixture.', 'Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 15 minutes. Garnish with basil.']

title: Stovetop Stuffing Meatloaf Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': '80/20 ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) box', 'Name': 'chicken stuffing (such as Stovetop)'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'poultry seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ketchup, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line an 8- x 4-inch loaf pan with a double layer of aluminum foil, leaving a 3-inch overhang on the long sides. Lightly coat with cooking spray and place on a baking sheet.', 'Using your hands, mix beef, stuffing mix, water, egg, salt, poultry seasoning, and 1/2 cup of the ketchup in a large bowl until evenly combined without overmixing.', 'Press into the prepared loaf pan on the baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until top is browned and the sides are bubbly, about 35 minutes.', 'While meatloaf bakes, whisk together brown sugar and remaining 1/2 cup ketchup in a small bowl until smooth. Remove meatloaf from the oven and spread ketchup mixture evenly over the top.', 'Return to the oven and continue baking at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest portion of meatloaf registers 160 degrees F (71 degrees C), 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to rest for 5 minutes.', 'Remove meatloaf from loaf pan using foil overhang as handles, and transfer to a cutting board. Cut into 8 slices.']

title: Chicken Pot Pie Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole roasted chicken'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ribs celery'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chicken bouillon paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green peas'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'pasta shells'}]
directions: ['Pull meat from chicken and refrigerate until needed.', 'Add 2 quarts of water to a pot and transfer in chicken bones, skin, and any meat scraps. Add bay leaf and bring to a simmer on high heat. Reduce to low and simmer for 2 hours. Remove to cool, about 1 hour. Strain broth and reserve in refrigerator until needed. This may make more broth than the 6 cups needed.', 'To make the pot pie mixture, add butter to a pot and melt over medium-high heat. Add onions, carrots, celery, and salt. Cook, stirring, until onions start to turn translucent, about 5 minutes.', 'Season with pepper, thyme, garlic powder, and cayenne, and cook for 1 minute more. Add flour and cook until flour toasts to a golden brown on the bottom of the pot, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Stir in 6 cups of broth, and bring to a simmer on high heat, then reduce to medium. Add peas and cream and cook, stirring, for 10 minutes. Cut chicken meat into small bite-size pieces and add it in. Cook 5 minutes more. Turn off heat and reserve.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Stir in pasta and return to a boil. Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, i minute less than specified in package directions.. Drain very well; stir pasta into pot pie mixture. Transfer everything into a large, deep baking dish (about 4 1/2 quart size), and distribute evenly.', 'Stir panko, salt, and melted butter together in a bowl; sprinkle evenly over casserole.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling around the edges and top is browned, 45 to 60 minutes. Let rest 10 to 15 minutes before serving.']

title: Easy One Pan Ramen Chicken Alfredo Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '(3 ounce) package', 'Name': 'chicken flavored ramen noodles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) jars', 'Name': 'Alfredo sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded cooked chicken, from one rotisserie chicken'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded Italian blend cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange uncooked ramen noodles in an even layer in the bottom of a large casserole dish, breaking noodle blocks as necessary to fit.\xa0Sprinkle 1 packet of seasoning evenly over noodles; discard remaining seasoning packets.', 'Pour 1 jar of Alfredo sauce evenly over noodles. Spread chicken evenly over sauce. Pour second jar of Alfredo sauce over chicken. Add water to first Alfredo jar, shake it to rinse sauce from the jar, and pour mixture over noodles. Add cream to second jar, shake, and pour over the casserole.\xa0 Top with cheese and pepper.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until browned and bubbly and noodles are tender, 50 to 60 minutes. Add up to 1/2 cup more water as needed, if too much is absorbed before noodles are cooked.']

title: Slow Cooker Loaded Chicken and Potatoes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ranch dressing mix'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'new potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ranch dressing'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded sharp\xa0Cheddar cheese,'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bacon to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'scallions for garnish'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients', 'Stir together chicken broth and ranch dressing mix in the bottom of a 5-quart slow cooker until combined. Add chicken breasts in an even layer over broth mixture, followed by an even layer of potatoes. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Cover and cook until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are fork tender, about 2 hours and 45 minutes on HIGH or about 3 hours and 45 minutes on LOW.', 'Remove chicken breasts from the slow cooker and place them on a cutting board. Let them cool slightly for 5 minutes. Coarsely shred the chicken using 2 forks.', 'Add cream cheese, ranch dressing, and 1 1/2 cups of the shredded cheese to slow cooker. Cover and cook on HIGH until cheeses begin to melt and potatoes are fully tender, about 10 minutes. Uncover and stir cheese mixture until just about fully combined.', 'Add shredded chicken back to slow cooker and stir until evenly coated in cheese mixture.', 'Divide among 8 shallow bowls. Garnish with remaining 1/2 cup shredded cheese, top with bacon and scallions. Serve immediately.']

title: Potato Soup with Chorizo Recipe

title: Creamy Chicken Boursin Orzo Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless skinless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'herbs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallot, minced'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'orzo pasta'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1 3/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sun-dried tomatoes, cut into short, thin strips'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(5.2 ounce) package', 'Name': 'BoursinÂ® Garlic and Fine Herbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'spinach'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Season both sides of chicken breasts with Cantanzaro herbs and salt.', 'Heat olive oil and butter in a deep dish cast iron skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat until shimmering. Add chicken in a single layer, and cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Remove to a plate and keep warm.', 'Add shallot and garlic to the same skillet. Cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
