directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).', 'Place sausage, bell pepper, and onion in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir until sausage is browned, about 5 minutes.', 'Whisk ketchup, steak sauce, liquid smoke, ground mustard, and celery seed in a large mixing bowl. Add sausage mixture and stir to combine. Add drained butter beans and gently stir until evenly combined. Pour into a baking dish; cover.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 25 minutes.']

title: Warm Broccoli Caesar Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'canola oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'canola oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup shaved', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hard-cooked eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic clove'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Spread out broccoli on a large rimmed baking sheet. Toss with 2 tablespoons of the canola oil, 3/4 teaspoon of the salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of the black pepper until evenly coated.', 'Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is bright green and browned in spots, 18 to 20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, combine 1/2 cup oil, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, eggs, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, Dijon mustard, 3/4 teaspoon black pepper, and 3/4 teaspoon salt in a blender; process until smooth, about 2 minutes. Refrigerate until ready to serve.', 'Add bacon to a large skillet over medium heat and cook, stirring occasionally, until crispy, about 10 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer to a paper towel-lined plate. Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon fat in skillet and do not wipe clean; discard remaining drippings.', 'Add panko and remaining 1/4 teaspoon black pepper to skillet over low heat; cook, stirring constantly, until golden brown, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Transfer broccoli to a large serving bowl. Top with panko, bacon, and remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan. Drizzle with desired amount of Caesar dressing. Refrigerate remaining Caesar dressing for up to 4 days.']

title: Dubai Chocolate Strawberry Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 to 6 (serving size: about 1/3 cup)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'semisweet chocolate chips'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'frozen or thawed kataifi'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3.9 ounce) package', 'Name': 'chocolate instant pudding and pie filling'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pistachio cream'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tap water'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lightly salted pistachios'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tahini'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'fresh strawberries'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'flaky sea salt'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat milk in a saucepan over low until steaming, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and whisk in chocolate chips until smooth.', 'Pour melted chocolate into a large shallow bowl. Cover with plastic wrap with wrap touching the surface of the chocolate mixture. Freeze until mixture is thickened and chilled, about 30 minutes.', 'While chocolate mixture chills, melt butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add kataifi and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and crispy, about 6 minutes. Transfer to a bowl; set aside 3 tablespoons for garnish.', 'Pour chilled chocolate mixture through a fine-mesh strainer set over a large bowl with instant pudding. Whisk mixture constantly until slightly thickened and pudding mix is dissolved, about 4 minutes. Refrigerate until ready to use.', 'In a separate bowl, stir together pistachio cream and water until smooth. Gently fold in kataifi, pistachios, and tahini until combined.', 'Transfer kataifi mixture to a shallow serving bowl; spread in an even layer. Then, top mixture with chocolate pudding in an even layer.', 'Garnish with reserved kataifi, pistachios, and flaky salt, if desired. Serve with strawberries.']

title: Avocado Butter Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'avocado'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, softened'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Place avocado, butter. lime juice, and cumin in a bowl. Mash until smooth, or use an immersion blender to blend. Season with salt and pepper.']

title: Garlic Shrimp in a Blanket Reipce
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Marinate Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 shrimp appetizers'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'shrimp (16 to 20 per pound count)'}, {'Quantity': '4 to 6', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, finely crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'hot sauce (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'Name': 'ready-to-use crescent roll dough'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'sesame seeds'}]
directions: ['Combine shrimp, garlic, oyster sauce, smoked paprika, hot sauce, pepper, and salt in a bowl and stir\xa0thoroughly to coat shrimp completely. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or up to overnight.', 'Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicone liner or parchment paper.', 'Place entire log of crescent dough, without unrolling, on a lightly-floured work surface, and cut in half. Roll each half into a 5x9-inch rectangle, then cut each rectangle into 6 equal 5-inch-long strips for a total of 12.', 'Center the large part of a shrimp on a dough strip, along with a generous amount of marinade, or less if you prefer a lighter garlic flavor. Fold one end of strip over the shrimp, and then cover with the other end, and finish with the seam on the bottom.', 'Place wrapped shrimp on the prepared baking sheet; repeat with the remaining 11 shrimp and dough strips. Space shrimp a couple inches apart.', 'Whisk egg and water together in a small bowl; brush each wrap with egg wash. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until tops are very well browned, and deep golden on the bottom, about 20 minutes.', 'For sauce, stir mayonnaise, mustard, mirin, and hot sauce together in a small bowl. Serve shrimp hot, warm, or at room temperature with sauce on the side.']

title: Marry Me Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sun-dried tomatoes in oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'oil from sun-dried tomatoes jar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen cut leaf spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups shredded', 'Name': 'low-moisture part-skim mozzarella chees'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'crostini'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Heat 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato oil in a 10-inch enamel-coated cast-iron skillet over medium. Add garlic and tomato paste and cook, stirring constantly, until garlic is fragrant and tomato paste is slightly darker in color, 2 to\xa03 minutes.', 'Remove the skillet from heat and whisk in cream cheese and sour cream until smooth. Fold in spinach, Parmesan, Italian seasoning, pepper, salt, sun-dried tomatoes, and 1 cup mozzarella until evenly combined.', 'Spread tomato mixture into an even layer. Sprinkle evenly with remaining 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese.', 'Bake in preheated oven until cheese is fully melted and edges are bubbling, 8 to 10 minutes. Without removing skillet from oven, increase oven temperature to broil. Broil until cheese is lightly browned on top, 3 to 5 minutes.\xa0Garnish with basil and serve immediately with crostini.']

title: Harissa Butternut Squash Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'butternut squash -'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, peeled'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'harissa paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss butternut squash, onion, and whole garlic with olive oil. Spread out on the prepared baking sheet.', 'Roast in the preheated oven until tender and slightly caramelized, 25 to 30 minutes.', 'Place cooked vegetables into the jar of a blender. If ingredients are hot, fill blender no more than halfway full, and hold lid down with a potholder. You may have to work in batches. Add broth, harissa paste, cumin, smoked paprika, and brown sugar. Blend until smooth', 'Pour blender contents into a stockpot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld. Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls and serve with a swirl of heavy cream, if desired.']

title: Lemon Crumb Bars Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Freeze Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '16 lemon bars'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking powder'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Line a 9x9-inch square pan with enough parchment paper to have overhang on all sides.', 'For crust and crumb, stir together melted butter, white sugar, brown sugar, salt, and vanilla until thoroughly combined. Add in flour and baking powder and mix until mixture comes together in large clumps. Measure out a loosely-packed 1 3/4 cups crumbs and press firmly and evenly into the bottom of prepared pan. Reserve remaining crumb mixture for topping.', 'Break an egg into a large bowl and whisk for a few seconds. Lightly brush a thin layer of egg over the crust; you will use any egg left in the filling. Place crust into the freezer for about 10 to 15 minutes while you prepare filling.', 'For filling, to the egg you used as egg wash, add the remaining 2 eggs, 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar, cornstarch, lemon zest, and pinch salt. Whisk until completely smooth and combined. Whisk in the 3 tablespoons melted butter until incorporated. Pour in lemon juice and whisk until combined.', 'Remove crust from freezer and pour the filling evenly over the top.', 'Bake bars in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.', 'Remove pan from oven and sprinkle reserved crumb topping evenly over the top, breaking up any larger crumbs as needed. Return pan to the oven.', 'Bake until crumbs just begin to turn golden, 20 to 25 minutes more. Allow bars to cool completely, about 30 minutes, before cutting and serving.']

title: Jalapeno Spinach Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter or olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, sliced, white part only'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapenos, seeded and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) bag', 'Name': 'fresh spinach,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Greens seasoning,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded Parmesan, plus more for topping'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Heat butter or olive oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add green onions, jalapenos, and garlic; cook and stir for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Add spinach, greens seasoning, and water. Cook and stir until spinach is wilted, about 3 minutes.', 'Stir cream cheese and mayonnaise together in a separate bowl; stir in spinach and Parmesan cheese. Spread evenly into an oven safe dish. Sprinkle with a little Parmesan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.']

title: Holly Berry Fizz Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'ounce', 'Name': 'pomegranate juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'ounce', 'Name': 'elderflower liqueur'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'prosecco'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh pomegranate aril'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rosemary sprig, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Add pomegranate juice and elderflower liqueur to a champagne flute. Top with prosecco, pouring gently to preserve the bubbles.', 'Drop in a few pomegranate arils and garnish with a sprig of rosemary.']

title: Sheet Pan Hawaiian Chicken Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). title: One Pan Balsamic Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'herbs'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic granules'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pint', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes, halved'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'fresh mozzarella, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'orzo'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'basil leaves, very thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'balsamic glaze, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Slice chicken breasts in half horizontally to create 4 thin chicken breasts. Stir Cantazaro herbs, garlic granules, onion powder, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl; season chicken on all sides with mixture.', 'Pour olive oil into a deep cast iron skillet or other ovenproof skillet and place over medium-high heat until oil is hot. Add chicken and sear until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Turn off heat; remove chicken to a plate.', 'Pour orzo into the skillet; add chicken broth and balsamic vinegar. Add chicken back to the skillet along with any accumulated juices. title: Kale and Roasted Delicata Squash Salad with Pomegranate Vinaigrette Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8-ounce)', 'Name': 'delicata squash'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground ginger'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and line a sheet pan with parchment paper.', 'Split delicata squash lengthwise and scoop out seeds and strands. Cut each squash half crosswise into 1/2-inch thick slices. Place squash pieces in a bowl and toss with olive oil, salt, black pepper, and ginger. Arrange on the prepared pan in a single layer.', 'Roast squash in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Using tongs, turn each piece and continue to roast until squash is tender and lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes more. Set aside to cool.', 'For vinaigrette, add pomegranate juice, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, white pepper, and cayenne to a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake until well blended, about 30 seconds.', 'For salad, place kale, pear slices, pomegranate arils, and red onion in a large salad bowl. Cut delicata into bite-sized pieces; add to the bowl. Shake vinaigrette again, then toss with salad.', 'Arrange salad on 4 plates, and top with sliced almonds and crumbled bacon; garnish with cheese. Serve immediately.']

title: French Onion Potato Gratin Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter, plus more for greasing'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sweet onions, peeled and cut into thin wedges'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh thyme'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'yukon gold potatoes, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded Gruyere cheese,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'French fried onions'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'garlic and herb croutons, coarsely crushed'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Lightly grease a 3-quart rectangular or oval baking dish.', 'Heat butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion wedges. Cook, covered, until onions are tender, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes. (If necessary, reduce heat to medium-low to prevent overbrowning before onions are tender.) Increase heat to medium-high and cook, uncovered, until onions are golden, stirring frequently, about 5 minutes more. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds more. Remove from heat and season with 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Set aside.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).', 'Stir together whipping cream, milk, thyme, remaining 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper; in a bowl; set aside.', 'Arrange half of the potatoes in the prepared dish, overlapping as necessary. Sprinkle with caramelized onions. Sprinkle with 1 cup Gruyere cheese. Layer remaining potatoes over cheese. Pour cream mixture over potatoes and top with 1 cup Gruyere cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 50 minutes.', 'Top with French friend onions, crushed croutons, and remaining 1/2 cup cheese. Bake until potatoes are tender and cheese is melted, 10 to 15 minutes more. Let stand for 15 minutes before serving.']

title: Slow Cooker Ground Beef Stroganoff Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion,'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sliced mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '10.5-ounce) can', 'Name': 'beef consomme'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'plain Greek yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'whipped cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3 3/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'egg noodles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'beef broth'}]

title: Italian Wedding Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried farfalle pasta'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) carton', 'Name': 'reduced-sodium chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped kale or baby spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(26-ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen Italian meatballs, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh oregano, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). title: Loaded Roasted Cauliflower Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'cauliflower'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion tops, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ranch salad dressing'}]

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'carrot'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes with basil, garlic and oregano,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper flakes (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(15.5 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'cannellini beans'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'baby spinach,'}]

title: Broccoli and Cheese Rice Casserole With Garlic Pretzel Topping Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'uncooked white rice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '10.5-ounce can', 'Name': 'condensed cream of mushroom soup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}]
directions: ['Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes. Set aside.', 'Meanwhile, place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add diced onion and cook until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 30 seconds.', 'Stir in cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and milk. directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat oil in a very large skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook until softened, about 4 minutes.\xa0Add garlic and cook 30 seconds more.', 'Add beans, artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes, oregano, crushed red pepper, black pepper, and salt to the skillet; stir to combine.', 'Pour in broth and cream; bring to a simmer and cook until lightly thickened, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes.', 'Add kale and reduce heat to low. Cook until kale begins to soften, stirring often, 2 to 3 minutes longer. Remove from the heat.', 'Sprinkle the cheese over the beans and stir; garnish with additional chopped fresh oregano.']

title: One Pan Dumpling Dinner
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'minced fresh garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ginger'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'toasted sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'full-fat coconut milk or cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bok choy'}, {'Quantity': '20', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pork and vegetable dumplings'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'toasted sesame seeds'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chili crunch oil ('}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Stir together garlic, ginger, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, curry paste, coconut milk, and water in a casserole dish until well combined. Add bok choy and toss lightly. Top with dumplings and cover casserole with foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until dumplings are heated through at the center, about 25 minutes.', 'Divide dumplings and bok choy among serving plates and top with sauce from the pan. Top evenly with cilantro, green onions, sesame seeds, and drizzle with chili crunch oil.']

title: Apple Cider Pork Tenderloin With Sweet Potatoes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound)', 'Name': 'pork tenderloin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Fuji apples'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white-fleshed sweet potato'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter,'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and line a sheet pan with parchment.\xa0Combine garlic, salt, pepper, thyme and smoked paprika in a small bowl.', 'Pat tenderloin dry with paper towels. Coat all sides with half of seasoning mixture, using fingertips to rub into the meat. Let seasoned tenderloin stand at room temperature while other ingredients are being prepped.', 'Combine apples, red onion, and sweet potato in a bowl. Sprinkle with remaining seasoning mixture and stir to combine. Melt 2 tablespoons butter, pour over seasoned mixture, and stir to coat. Spread in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.', 'Roast in the center of the preheated oven, uncovered, for about 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, melt remaining butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When butter stops sizzling, add tenderloin to the skillet and brown on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Nestle tenderloin into the middle of the sheet pan with apple mixture.', 'Return pan to the oven and roast while glaze is prepared, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for glaze, to the same skillet add apple cider, red wine vinegar, and Dijon mustard. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a full rolling boil. Allow liquid to reduce to about 1 cup, and spoon generously over tenderloin and apple mixture.', 'Continue roasting until the internal temperature of the thickest part of pork reaches 140 degrees F (60 degrees C), 5 to 10 minutes more.', 'Remove from the oven and tent with foil. Allow to rest about 5 minutes. Residual cooking should bring pork up to 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), when tested with an instant read thermometer.', 'To serve, slice pork into 1/2-inch slices, garnish with fresh thyme, and serve with roasted vegetables and apples.']

title: Duchess Potato Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'Yukon gold potatoe'}, {'Quantity': '3 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '9', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(5.3-ounce) package', 'Name': 'boursin garlic & fine herbs cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chives'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg yolks'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with cold water to a depth of 2 inches; add 2 teaspoons salt.', 'Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, reduce heat to medium and simmer potatoes until they are tender and easily mashed with a fork, about 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Drain and return potatoes to the pot. Cook over medium, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes to help dry potatoes.', 'Mash potatoes and 8 tablespoons butter until mostly smooth. (Some small pieces of potato are OK.)', 'Add boursin, cream, chives, pepper, nutmeg, and remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons salt; mash until well combined, stopping to scrape down sides as needed.', 'Add in egg yolks, 1 at a time, stirring between each addition until incorporated.', 'Spread potato mixture evenly in a 2- to 2 1/4-quart baking dish. Gently brush top of potato mixture with remaining 1 tablespoon butter.', 'Score top as desired using the tines of a fork; wipe fork clean as needed.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, slightly puffed, and an instant read thermometer inserted in center registers 160 degrees F (71 degrees C), about 30 minutes.', 'Let stand 10 minutes before serving.\xa0 Garnish with chives and pepper.']

title: Loaded Tater Tot Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'thick-cut bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cups milk'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32-ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen bite-sized potato nuggets (Tater TotsÂ®'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (230 degrees C). Grease a 2-quart square baking dish.', 'Cook bacon in a large skillet until crisp, about 8 minutes. Drain on paper towels. When cool enough to handle, crumble bacon. Drain all but 2 tablespoons bacon drippings from the skillet.', 'Add onion to the skillet. Cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes.', 'Add flour and cayenne pepper to skillet; cook and stir 1 minute.', 'Add 2 cups milk to the skillet. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly, about 3 minutes.', 'Gradually add 1 cup cheese to skillet, stirring until melted. Stir in half of green onions.', 'Place 1/2 cup sour cream in a small bowl. Gradually whisk in about 1/2 cup of hot sauce mixture. Return mixture to the skillet. Return to a simmer.', 'Add half of tots to the prepared baking dish. Top with half of sauce and half of bacon.\xa0Top with remaining tots, remaining sauce, remaining bacon, and remaining cheese.', 'Bake until bubbly and cheese on top is lightly browned, 35 minutes.', 'For dill cream, whisk together 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon milk, and dill.', 'Drizzle over the casserole and top with remaining green onions.']

title: Whole Orange Blender Cake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': "confectioner's sugar"}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'orange juice'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Coat an 8x4-inch loaf pan with nonstick spray and line with parchment paper.', 'Wash the orange and blot dry with paper towels. Cut in 8ths, removing any seeds.', 'Combine orange pieces, eggs, sugar, melted butter, and vanilla in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth, about 30 seconds. Add flour, baking powder, and salt. Cover and pulse just until combined and batter is smooth.', 'Add batter to prepared pan.', 'Bake until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes.', 'Cool in the pan on a wire rack 10 minutes. Remove from pan and cool completely on a wire rack.', 'Whisk together powdered sugar and orange juice until smooth. Drizzle over the cooled loaf.']

title: Mediterranean Salmon Baked in Parchment Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(6 to 8-ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon fillets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'squares', 'Name': 'parchment paper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'pecans'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Greek seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'grapeseed oil'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'portobello mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'artichoke hearts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'inot Grigio or other dry white wine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'roasted bell pepper'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Place each salmon fillet on a sheet of parchment.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter and brush over salmon. Combine panko, pecans, garlic salt, and 1/2 teaspoon Greek seasoning in a small bowl and stir together. Evenly sprinkle over salmon fillets.', 'Crimp and fold parchment around fillets to form a packet. Place packets on a rimmed baking tray.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork, about 25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for sauce, heat grapeseed oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes. Stir in artichoke hearts, remaining 1/2 teaspoon Greek seasoning and pepper, and continue to cook and stir for about 6 minutes. Pour in white wine. Biring to a simmer and cook until liquid is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.', 'Add roasted bell pepper, and cook, stirring, until peppers are warmed through, about 1 minute. Stir in remaining butter to melt, about 1 minute more.', 'Carefully peel back parchment from salmon and ladle sauce over the salmon.']

title: Nordstrom's Tomato Basil Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'carrots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onions'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried basil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 (', 'Unit': '28 ounce) can', 'Name': 'whole peeled tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}]
directions: ['For soup, heat olive oil in a 3 to 4 quart pot over medium heat. Add carrots and onions, and cook, stirring frequently, until vegetables are softened, 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Add dried basil, salt, and black pepper, and stir for about 1 minute. Add tomatoes and their juices along with vegetable broth. Stir, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and slowly simmer 20 to 25 minutes, uncovered. Add minced fresh basil and cream and simmer about 5 minutes more.', 'Puree the soup with a stick blender or a blender. Taste and adjust seasonings.', 'Meanwhile, for crostini, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment. Place baguette slices on the prepared pan.', 'Combine butter, granulated garlic, salt, and minced parsley in a bowl. Use a spatula to mash and stir until well mixed. Add shredded Parmesan and stir until a paste is formed.', 'Spread about 1 tablespoon garlic-Parmesan paste on each baguette slice.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and crunchy, 12 to 15 minutes, or until lightly browned and crunchy.', 'To serve, ladle soup into serving bowls and serve with crostini. Garnish with fresh basil.']

title: Skillet Garlic Knot Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 (serving size: 1 cutlet, 2 Tbsp. sauce)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken breast cutlets'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'garlic cloves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'roughly chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon wedges'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Pat chicken dry with paper towels and season chicken all over with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper; set aside.', 'Heat oil and 2 tablespoons of the butter in a large skillet over medium-high. Add chicken in an even layer, in batches if necessary; cook, turning once halfway through, until browned and a thermometer inserted into thickest portion of chicken registers 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), 3 to 4 minutes per side. Remove chicken from skillet, using tongs, and set on plate; set aside. Do not wipe skillet clean.', 'With skillet off the heat, add remaining 4 tablespoons butter and stir until melted, about 1 minute. Add garlic and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds.', 'Return skillet to medium, and add chicken in an even layer with any accumulated juices. Add parsley and remaining 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper; cook, turning chicken occasionally, until chicken is heated through, about 1 minute.', 'Remove from heat. Sprinkle evenly with Parmesan cheese and garnish with additional parsley. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.']

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Alfredo Lasagna Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'lasagna noodles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'fresh spinach, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '22', 'Unit': 'ounces A', 'Name': 'lfredo sauce (such as Prego Homestyle Alfredo)'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked, shredded chicken'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'torn fresh basil leaves (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.\xa0Break lasagna noodles into 4 to 5 pieces and drop into the boiling water.\xa0Cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until just al dente.\xa0Drain and set aside.', 'Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat.\xa0Add onion and cook until soft, stirring constantly, about 3 minutes.\xa0Add spinach and cook, stirring constantly until wilted and liquid has evaporated.\xa0Stir in alfredo sauce and cook for 1 minute.\xa0Stir in chicken, 2/3 cup mozzarella and basil, if using.\xa0Remove from heat and stir in cooked pasta.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees C (190 degrees C).', 'Drizzle remaining olive oil evenly over a 18 x 13-inch rimmed baking sheet (half sheet pan).\xa0Pour lasagna mixture into the pan and spread it evenly to the edges.\xa0Dollop ricotta randomly over the pasta and sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and bubbly, about 25 minutes.\xa0Sprinkle with parsley and serve.']

title: Baked Sweet and Sour Chicken Thighs with Pineapple Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green bell pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pineapple chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'low-sodium soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'clove garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ginger paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion, sliced, or as needed (optional)'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking dish or spray with cooking spray.', 'Pat chicken thighs dry with a paper towel, cut into 1-inch chunks, and add to the dish. Sprinkle with cornstarch, and toss until chicken is coated. Stir in onions, green and red bell peppers, and pineapple.', 'Add ketchup, rice vinegar, brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger paste to a small bowl, whisk until well combined, and stir into the chicken mixture.', 'Bake until chicken is no longer pink at the center and juices run clear, 14 to 17 minutes, stirring halfway through. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). If sauce is a bit thick, stir in a splash of water to thin out until you reach your desired consistency.', 'Garnish with green onion slices and serve.']

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Balsamic Chicken and Potatoes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'baby potatoes,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red chili flakes'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil. Place chicken and potatoes in a large bowl.', 'Whisk 1/4 cup olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, paprika, oregano, garlic, black pepper, and chili flakes together in a small bowl. Pour mixture over chicken and potatoes; toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes on the prepared baking sheet in an even layer.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until chicken juices run clear and potatoes are tender, 30 to 35 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center of chicken should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).', 'Meanwhile, for brine, stir 2 tablespoons olive oil, olives, lemon juice, pepperoncini, basil, and dill together in a small bowl. Stir tzatziki sauce and feta together in a separate bowl.', 'Remove chicken and potatoes from the oven. Divide onto serving plates. Drizzle with olive brine and top with tzatziki feta sauce. Serve immediately.']

title: Green Goddess Chicken and Cucumber Wraps Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(7 inch)', 'Name': 'spinach herb tortillas'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'leaf', 'Name': 'lettuce leaves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(1 ounce) slices', 'Name': 'mozzarella'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cooked chicken breast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cucumber'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'avocado'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'thin slice', 'Name': 'sweet onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'green goddess salad dressing,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion leaves'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'grape tomatoes'}]
directions: ['For each wrap, place a tortilla on a flat work surface and cover half the tortilla surface with a piece of leaf lettuce. Top lettuce with 1 mozzarella slice, and distribute 1/3 cup shredded chicken\xa0over cheese.', 'Cut cucumber in half crosswise. Cut one half into 6 to 8 cucumber spears, and set aside. Use a vegetable peeler to shave remaining half of cucumber into very thin pieces, avoiding seeds. Place 1/2 of shaved cucumber on top of chicken.', 'Add half the avocado slices and half the sweet onion rings. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon green goddess dressing. Begin rolling the tortilla from the filled edge to the unfilled edge. Roll wrap in a paper towel to mold. Meanwhile, repeat steps with remaining ingredients for second wrap.', 'Release first wrap from paper towel and tie closed with a green onion leaf or chive. Release and tie second wrap.', 'To serve, place wraps on a bed of leaf lettuce. Lettuce leaves may be used for an optional outer wrap. Garnish with reserved cucumber spears and grape tomatoes.']

title: Carbonara Beans Recipe
